name: Cubrick
description:
Cubrick is a 2D-platform puzzle game.

Players have to control 2 cubricks at the same time to solve puzzles.



There are at least 50 levels and 5 secret levels.

Achievements and trading cards are available.

Play time around 2 hours.

Arrows to control; Enter to select; Esc to pause; Z to build.

And your brain to pass each level!
